metadata.title: USN-2831-1 -- cups-filters vulnerability
metadata.description: Michal Kowalczyk discovered that the cups-filters foomatic-rip filter incorrectly stripped shell escape characters. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code as the lp user.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2831-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libfontembed-dev - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.6 libfontembed1 - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.6 libcupsfilters-dev - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.6 cups-filters - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.6 cups-browsed - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.6 cups-filters-core-drivers - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.6 libcupsfilters1 - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.6 No subscription required
